Portland.Portland Farmers Market (Maine):
The Portland Farmers Market is a farmers market in Portland, Maine, U.S. Located in Deering Oaks, the market was named one of the ten best farmers markets in the United States by Travel + Leisure magazine in May 2010. It is known for organic agricultural products as well as its community atmosphere.
